entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
